scripts.tunnel:mercadopago: echo 'üöÄ Iniciando t√∫nel HTTPS para Mercado Pago OAuth...' && echo 'üîó Tu URL HTTPS aparecer√° abajo:' && ssh -R 80:localhost:3000 nokey@localhost.run
scripts.dev:tunnel: echo 'üöÄ Para desarrollo con OAuth:' && echo '1. Ejecuta: pnpm run tunnel:mercadopago (en otra terminal)' && echo '2. Copia la URL HTTPS que aparece' && echo '3. Configura esa URL en Mercado Pago' && echo '4. Usa esa URL para acceder a tu app' && echo '' && echo '‚ñ∂Ô∏è Iniciando servidor de desarrollo...' && next dev
scripts.test:production:check: node -e "if (!require('fs').existsSync('.next')) { console.log('‚ùå No se encontr√≥ build. Ejecuta: pnpm run build'); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('‚úÖ Build de producci√≥n encontrado'); }"
scripts.test:production:start: echo 'üöÄ Iniciando servidor de producci√≥n en puerto 3000...' && pnpm run start
scripts.test:production:wait: echo '‚è≥ Esperando que el servidor est√© listo...' && sleep 15
scripts.test:performance: pnpm run test:production:check && playwright test e2e/sales-performance.spec.ts --project=chromium
scripts.test:benchmark: pnpm run test:production:check && playwright test e2e/benchmark-comparison.spec.ts --project=chromium
scripts.test:performance:report: pnpm run test:production:check && playwright test e2e/sales-performance.spec.ts --reporter=html
scripts.test:performance:all: pnpm run test:production:check && pnpm run test:performance && pnpm run test:benchmark && pnpm run test:lighthouse
scripts.test:cache: pnpm run test:production:check && playwright test e2e/cache-performance.spec.ts --project=chromium --workers=1
scripts.test:cache-simple: pnpm run test:production:check && playwright test e2e/cache-simple-test.spec.ts --project=chromium --workers=1
scripts.test:cache-effectiveness: pnpm run test:production:check && playwright test e2e/cache-effectiveness-test.spec.ts --project=chromium --workers=1
scripts.test:quick: pnpm run test:production:check && playwright test e2e/quick-auth-test.spec.ts --project=chromium
scripts.test:debug-login: pnpm run test:production:check && playwright test e2e/debug-login.spec.ts --project=chromium --workers=1
scripts.test:production-full: pnpm run build && pnpm run test:production:start & sleep 15 && pnpm run test:cache-effectiveness && pkill -f 'next start'
scripts.test:production-vs-dev: pnpm run test:production:check && playwright test e2e/production-vs-dev-test.spec.ts --project=chromium --workers=1
scripts.build:test: pnpm run build && echo '‚úÖ Build completado para testing de producci√≥n'
